evidence.text:
Person A: I know many people despise their exes, but Alicia might have been my best friend.
Person A: I'm glad you approve.
Person A: Or at least the person who knew me best.
Person B: Wow. I have a feeling you never wanted to murder me when we were married.
Person A: You're saying it like it's a bad thing?
Person B: No, no... It's just an observation. I mean, to kill someone, I'd just imagine you'd have to be capable of some serious passion.
Person A: I'm not incapable of passion.
